text:
Hey there, Producer!
Mornin' to ya~~!

Good morning! Kogane.
Haha, you're full of energy today too.

Well, shoot!
I'm just all fired up for our debut live!

Oh, that's reassuring.
I'm already in the middle of planning the concept.

Heck yeah~! Much obliged~!
Now, I reckon I better hightail it to practice right quick--

W-Well now, I'm jest fine~!
Just about tripped over my own boots, is all.

I see... that's good then.
It's important to have momentum, but be careful, okay?

Yeah~!
Ya' can count on me~!

When it comes to idols, ain't nobody gonna beat us!
So, ya' better keep an eye on us, Producer!
